title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added three new staging environments (balsam, hinoki, yew) with deployment configurations and emoji messages.
Created a new Copilot Chat tutorial article on template creation with example README template.
Added three new evergreen PNG images (balsam.png, hinoki.png, yew.png) and excluded them from orphan checks.
Migrated `convert-markdown-for-docs` script from JavaScript to TypeScript with type annotations.
Updated GitHub Actions workflow comment to remove DIY docs label reference.
Renamed test file to TypeScript and added new staging names to app configuration.
